archive_id_get.description: Uses the given identifier to return its latest version

archive_id_post.description: Retrieve the latest version for a set of identifiers

cafe_tree.description: Retrieves a cafe tree of the gene tree using the gene tree stable identifier

cafe_tree_member_id.description: Retrieves the cafe tree of the gene tree that contains the gene / transcript / translation stable identifier

cafe_tree_member_symbol.description: Retrieves the cafe tree of the gene tree that contains the gene identified by a symbol

family.description: Retrieves a family information using the family stable identifier

family_member_id.description: Retrieves the information for all the families that contains the gene / transcript / translation stable identifier

family_member_symbol.description: Retrieves the information for all the families that contains the gene identified by a symbol

genetree.description: Retrieves a gene tree for a gene tree stable identifier

genetree_member_id.description: Retrieves the gene tree that contains the gene / transcript / translation stable identifier

genetree_member_symbol.description: Retrieves the gene tree that contains the gene identified by a symbol

genomic_alignment_region.description: Retrieves genomic alignments as separate blocks based on a region and species

homology_ensemblgene.description: Retrieves homology information (orthologs) by Ensembl gene id

xref_external.description: Looks up an external symbol and returns all Ensembl objects linked to it. This can be a display name for a gene/transcript/translation, a synonym or an externally linked reference. If a gene's transcript is linked to the supplied symbol the service will return both gene and transcript (it supports transient links).

xref_id.description: Perform lookups of Ensembl Identifiers and retrieve their external references in other databases

xref_name.description: Performs a lookup based upon the primary accession or display label of an external reference and returning the information we hold about the entry

species_id.description: Returns the p-value for each SNP in a given gene (e.g. ENSG00000227232)

species_variant.description: Returns the p-values for a SNP (e.g. rs123)

tissues.description: Returns all tissues currently available in the DB

analysis.description: List the names of analyses involved in generating Ensembl data.

assembly_info.description: List the currently available assemblies for a species, along with toplevel sequences, chromosomes and cytogenetic bands.

assembly_stats.description: Returns information about the specified toplevel sequence region for the given species.

biotypes.description: List the functional classifications of gene models that Ensembl associates with a particular species. Useful for restricting the type of genes/transcripts retrieved by other endpoints.

biotypes_groups.description: Without argument the list of available biotype groups is returned. With :group argument provided, list the properties of biotypes within that group. Object type (gene or transcript) can be provided for filtering.

biotypes_name.description: List the properties of biotypes with a given name. Object type (gene or transcript) can be provided for filtering.

compara_methods.description: List all compara analyses available (an analysis defines the type of comparative data).

compara_species_sets.description: List all collections of species analysed with the specified compara method.

comparas.description: Lists all available comparative genomics databases and their data release. DEPRECATED: use info/genomes/division instead.

data.description: Shows the data releases available on this REST server. May return more than one release (unfrequent non-standard Ensembl configuration).

eg_version.description: Returns the Ensembl Genomes version of the databases backing this service

external_dbs.description: Lists all available external sources for a species.

info_divisions.description: Get list of all Ensembl divisions for which information is available

info_genome.description: Find information about a given genome

info_genomes_accession.description: Find information about genomes containing a specified INSDC accession

info_genomes_assembly.description: Find information about a genome with a specified assembly

info_genomes_division.description: Find information about all genomes in a given division. May be large for Ensembl Bacteria.

info_genomes_taxonomy.description: Find information about all genomes beneath a given node of the taxonomy

ping.description: Checks if the service is alive.

rest.description: Shows the current version of the Ensembl REST API.

software.description: Shows the current version of the Ensembl API used by the REST server.

species.description: Lists all available species, their aliases, available adaptor groups and data release.

variation.description: List the variation sources used in Ensembl for a species.

variation_population_name.description: List all individuals for a population from a species

variation_populations.description: List all populations for a species

ld_id_get.description: Computes and returns LD values between the given variant and all other variants in a window centered around the given variant. The window size is set to 500 kb.

ld_pairwise_get.description: Computes and returns LD values between the given variants.

ld_region_get.description: Computes and returns LD values between all pairs of variants in the defined region.

lookup.description: Find the species and database for a single identifier e.g. gene, transcript, protein

lookup_post.description: Find the species and database for several identifiers. IDs that are not found are returned with no data.

symbol_lookup.description: Find the species and database for a symbol in a linked external database

symbol_post.description: Find the species and database for a set of symbols in a linked external database. Unknown symbols are omitted from the response.

assembly_cdna.description: Convert from cDNA coordinates to genomic coordinates. Output reflects forward orientation coordinates as returned from the Ensembl API.

assembly_cds.description: Convert from CDS coordinates to genomic coordinates. Output reflects forward orientation coordinates as returned from the Ensembl API.

assembly_map.description: Convert the co-ordinates of one assembly to another

assembly_translation.description: Convert from protein (translation) coordinates to genomic coordinates. Output reflects forward orientation coordinates as returned from the Ensembl API.

ontology_ancestors.description: Reconstruct the entire ancestry of a term from is_a and part_of relationships

ontology_ancestors_chart.description: Reconstruct the entire ancestry of a term from is_a and part_of relationships.

ontology_descendants.description: Find all the terms descended from a given term. By default searches are conducted within the namespace of the given identifier

ontology_id.description: Search for an ontological term by its namespaced identifier

ontology_name.description: Search for a list of ontological terms by their name

taxonomy_classification.description: Return the taxonomic classification of a taxon node

taxonomy_id.description: Search for a taxonomic term by its identifier or name

taxonomy_name.description: Search for a taxonomic id by a non-scientific name

overlap_id.description: Retrieves features (e.g. genes, transcripts, variants and more) that overlap a region defined by the given identifier.

overlap_region.description: Retrieves features (e.g. genes, transcripts, variants and more) that overlap a given region.

overlap_translation.description: Retrieve features related to a specific Translation as described by its stable ID (e.g. domains, variants).

phenotype_accession.description: Return phenotype annotations for genomic features given a phenotype ontology accession

phenotype_gene.description: Return phenotype annotations for a given gene.

phenotype_region.description: Return phenotype annotations that overlap a given genomic region.

phenotype_term.description: Return phenotype annotations for genomic features given a phenotype ontology term

array.description: Returns information about a specific microarray

fetch_all_epigenomes.description: Returns information about all epigenomes available for the given species

list_all_microarrays.description: Returns information about all microarrays available for the given species

probe.description: Returns information about a specific probe from a microarray

probe_set.description: Returns information about a specific probe_set from a microarray

regulatory_id.description: Returns a RegulatoryFeature given its stable ID (e.g. ENSR00000006733)

sequence_id.description: Request multiple types of sequence by stable identifier. Supports feature masking and expand options.

sequence_id_post.description: Request multiple types of sequence by a stable identifier list.

sequence_region.description: Returns the genomic sequence of the specified region of the given species. Supports feature masking and expand options.

sequence_region_post.description: Request multiple types of sequence by a list of regions.

transcript_haplotypes_get.description: Computes observed transcript haplotype sequences based on phased genotype data

vep_hgvs_get.description: Fetch variant consequences based on a HGVS notation

vep_hgvs_post.description: Fetch variant consequences for multiple HGVS notations

vep_id_get.description: Fetch variant consequences based on a variant identifier

vep_id_post.description: Fetch variant consequences for multiple ids

vep_region_post.description: Fetch variant consequences for multiple regions

variant_recoder.description: Translate a variant identifier, HGVS notation or genomic SPDI notation to all possible variant IDs, HGVS and genomic SPDI

variant_recoder_post.description: Translate a list of variant identifiers, HGVS notations or genomic SPDI notations to all possible variant IDs, HGVS and genomic SPDI

variation_id.description: Uses a variant identifier (e.g. rsID) to return the variation features including optional genotype, phenotype and population data

variation_pmcid_get.description: Fetch variants by publication using PubMed Central reference number (PMCID)

variation_pmid_get.description: Fetch variants by publication using PubMed reference number (PMID)

variation_post.description: Uses a list of variant identifiers (e.g. rsID) to return the variation features including optional genotype, phenotype and population data

beacon_query_get.description: Return the Beacon response for allele information

beacon_query_post.description: Return the Beacon response for allele information

features_id.description: Return the GA4GH record for a specific sequence feature given its identifier

features_post.description: Return a list of sequence annotation features in GA4GH format

gacallSet.description: Return a list of sets of genotype calls for specific samples in GA4GH format

gacallset_id.description: Return the GA4GH record for a specific CallSet given its identifier

gadataset.description: Return a list of datasets in GA4GH format

gadataset_id.description: Return the GA4GH record for a specific dataset given its identifier

gafeatureset.description: Return a list of feature sets in GA4GH format

gafeatureset_id.description: Return the GA4GH record for a specific featureSet given its identifier

gavariant_id.description: Return the GA4GH record for a specific variant given its identifier.

gavariantannotations.description: Return variant annotation information in GA4GH format for a region on a reference sequence

gavariants.description: Return variant call information in GA4GH format for a region on a reference sequence

gavariantset.description: Return a list of variant sets in GA4GH format

gavariantset_id.description: Return the GA4GH record for a specific VariantSet given its identifier

references.description: Return a list of reference sequences in GA4GH format

references_id.description: Return data for a specific reference in GA4GH format by id

referenceSets.description: Return a list of reference sets in GA4GH format

referenceSets_id.description: Return data for a specific reference set in GA4GH format

VariantAnnotationSet.description: Return a list of annotation sets in GA4GH format

VariantAnnotationSet_id.description: Return meta data for a specific annotation set in GA4GH format
